name: Acrobatics
description: You are skilled at acrobatics.

categorySkills.name: Acrobatics_SwiftReflexes
categorySkills.description: You gain a +5 bonus to your DV when flinching away from missile attacks.

categorySkills.name: Acrobatics_Dodge
categorySkills.description: You gain a +2 bonus to your DV.

categorySkills.name: Acrobatics_Jump
categorySkills.description: You jump into an unoccupied square within range 2. You cannot jump over a square occupied by a creature.

categorySkills.name: Acrobatics_Tumble
categorySkills.description: You gain a +1 bonus to your DV. Additionally, Juke's cooldown is reduced to 20.

name: Axe
description: You are skilled with axes.

categorySkills.name: Axe_Expertise
categorySkills.description: You get +2 to hit with axes.

categorySkills.name: Axe_Cleave
categorySkills.description: Whenever you hit an opponent with an axe, there's a 75% chance you cleave their armor, giving them a -1 penalty to their AV. This penalty can stack a number of times up to half your Str modifier, rounded up, +1 on a critical hit.

categorySkills.name: Cudgel_ChargingStrike
categorySkills.description: When you charge with an axe and hit, if you cleave their armor, they get an additional -1 penalty to their AV. If you have Dismember, your chance to dismember when charging with an axe is doubled. When you charge with a cudgel and hit, you automatically daze your opponent.

categorySkills.name: Axe_Dismember
categorySkills.description: Activated; cooldown 30. Axe attack. If you hit and penetrate, you dismember one of their limbs at random and they start bleeding (1-2 damage per turn. toughness save; difficulty 35). Additionally, your axe attacks that penetrate have a percentage chance to dismember: 3% for one-handed axes and 6% for two-handed axes.

categorySkills.name: Axe_HookAndDrag
categorySkills.description: Activated; cooldown 50. You grab an opponent's limb with the heel of your axe. If successful, you pull your opponent with you as you move and make a free attack with your axe. Your opponent gets a chance to resist the move (strength save; difficulty 20 + your Str modifier) and a chance to break free at the start of their turn (same save). Lasts for 9 rounds or until you dismember the opponent.

categorySkills.name: Axe_Decapitate
categorySkills.description: Heads are added to the list of possible limbs you can dismember. Chopping off the only head of a creature kills them instantly. If the creature has multiple heads, they start bleeding profusely (2-3 damage per turn. toughness save; difficulty 35).

categorySkills.name: Axe_Berserk
categorySkills.description:
Activated; cooldown 100.
You enter a blood frenzy, and for 5 rounds your chance to dismember with axe attacks is 100%. To use Berserk, Dismember must be off cooldown, and using Berserk puts Dismember on cooldown.

name: Rifles
description: You are skilled with bows and rifles.

categorySkills.name: Rifle_SteadyHands
categorySkills.description: For the purpose of determining your accuracy with bows and rifles, your agility is treated as if it were 4 points higher.

categorySkills.name: Rifle_DrawABead
categorySkills.description: You spend a turn to draw a bead on a target and mark it. Whenever you fire at a marked target with a bow or rifle, your agility is treated as if it were 2 points higher for the purpose of determining your accuracy. You may only mark one target at a time. Targets get unmarked if you lose vision of them.

categorySkills.name: Rifle_SuppressiveFire
categorySkills.description: You fire at a marked target. If your shot penetrates, your target is suppressed and can't move for 3-5 rounds. Then your target is unmarked.

categorySkills.name: Rifle_FlatteningFire
categorySkills.description: As long as your target is surrounded by 6 or more solid obstacles, Suppressive Fire is upgraded to Flattening Fire. Flattening Fire also knocks your target prone and disarms them.

categorySkills.name: Rifle_WoundingFire
categorySkills.description: You fire at a marked target. For each penetration on each shot that hits, your target bleeds 1 point of damage per round (save: 20 + max damage of the weapon). Then your target is unmarked.

categorySkills.name: Rifle_DisorientingFire
categorySkills.description: As long as your target can't see or hear any faction allies, Wounding Fire is upgraded to Disorienting Fire. Disorienting Fire also reduces your target's DV and MA by 4.

categorySkills.name: Rifle_SureFire
categorySkills.description: You fire at a marked target with no accuracy penalty (the accuracy of your weapon still matters). Then your target is unmarked.

categorySkills.name: Rifle_BeaconFire
categorySkills.description: As long as your target is flaming, luminous, or phosphorescent, Sure Fire is upgraded to Beacon Fire. Beacon Fire shots are also treated as critical hits.

categorySkills.name: Rifle_OneShot
categorySkills.description: Cooldown 100. You fire at a marked target. Your shot combines the effects of all the other Fire powers you have.

name: CookingAndGathering
description: You are skilled at cooking and gathering meal ingredients.

categorySkills.name: CookingAndGathering_MealPreparation
categorySkills.description:
While at a campfire, you can cook from recipes, choose up to two ingredients to cook with, and preserve fresh foods.
Meals cooked from recipes bestow special status effects. Meals cooked with selected ingredients bestow dynamically-generated status effects.
Preserved foods are used as meal ingredients.

categorySkills.name: CookingAndGathering_Harvestry
categorySkills.description: You can harvest fresh ingredients and other usable parts from plants.

categorySkills.name: CookingAndGathering_Butchery
categorySkills.description: You can butcher fresh ingredients and other usable parts from animal corpses.

categorySkills.name: CookingAndGathering_Spicer
categorySkills.description: When you choose ingredients to cook with, you can choose up to three instead of two. Meals cooked with three ingredients bestow more powerful status effects.

categorySkills.name: CookingAndGathering_CarbideChef
categorySkills.description: Whenever you gain a level, and 5% of the time you explore a new map, you become inspired for two days. While inspired, the next time you cook a meal by choosing ingredients, you get a choice of three dynamically-generated effects to apply. You create a recipe for the chosen effect.

name: Cudgel
description: You are skilled with crushing and bludgeoning weapons.

categorySkills.name: Cudgel_Expertise
categorySkills.description: You get +2 to hit with cudgels.

categorySkills.name: Cudgel_Bludgeon
categorySkills.description: Whenever you hit with a cudgel, there's a 50% chance to daze your opponent (-4 int, -4 agi, -10 movespeed) for 3-4 rounds. If you daze a dazed opponent, they're stunned for 1 round instead (cannot take actions and 0 DV).

categorySkills.name: Cudgel_ChargingStrike
categorySkills.description: When you charge with a cudgel and hit, you automatically daze your opponent. When you charge with an axe and hit, if you cleave their armor, they get an additional -1 penalty to their AV. If you have Dismember, your chance to dismember when charging with an axe is doubled.

categorySkills.name: Cudgel_Conk
categorySkills.description:
Activated; cooldown 10.
You make an attack with a cudgel at an adjacent opponent. If you hit, you automatically daze them for 3-4 rounds. Dazing a dazed opponent stuns them. Conking a stunned opponent instead knocks them unconscious for 30-40 rounds (unconscious opponents wake up dazed when they take damage).

categorySkills.name: Cudgel_Backswing
categorySkills.description: Whenever you make a cudgel attack with your primary hand, there's a 25% chance you make an additional free attack with the same hand.

categorySkills.name: Cudgel_Slam
categorySkills.description: Activated; cooldown 50. You make an attack with a cudgel at an adjacent opponent with +1 to your penetration roll. If you hit, you slam your opponent backwards up to 3 spaces, pushing other creatures and breaking through walls if their AVs are less than 5 times your Strength modifier. Opponents who get pushed are stunned for 1 round plus an additional round for each space pushed. Opponents who are pushed through or against walls take extra weapon damage for each wall. Gigantic opponents don't get pushed but are still stunned for 1 round. Destroys a wall or door if its AV is under 5 times your Strength modifier.

categorySkills.name: Cudgel_SmashUp
categorySkills.description:
Activated; cooldown 100.
For the next 5 rounds, your chance to daze with cudgel attacks is 100% and Slam has no cooldown. To use Demolish, Slam must be off cooldown, and using Demolish puts Slam on cooldown.

name: Customs
description: You are familiar with the customs and folklore of Qud.

categorySkills.name: Customs_Tactful
categorySkills.description: Whenever you begin the water ritual with a new creature, you gain 25 bonus reputation. If you purchase this power after you treat with a creature, you gain 25 bonus reputation the next time you treat with them.

categorySkills.name: Customs_TrashDivining
categorySkills.description: Whenever you rifle through trash, there's a 5% chance you piece together clues and learn a random secret.

name: SingleWeaponFighting
description: You may choose not to make offhand attacks in exchange for mastery with a single weapon.

categorySkills.name: SingleWeaponFighting_OpportuneAttacks
categorySkills.description: Whenever you score a critical hit with a melee weapon while single-weapon fighting, the cooldowns of up to two random weapon or shield skills are immediately refreshed.

categorySkills.name: SingleWeaponFighting_WeaponExpertise
categorySkills.description: Whenever you make a melee attack while single-weapon fighting, there's a 50% chance you immediately make a second attack for free.

categorySkills.name: SingleWeaponFighting_PenetratingStrikes
categorySkills.description: While single-weapon fighting, your melee attacks always penetrate one extra time.

categorySkills.name: SingleWeaponFighting_WeaponMastery
categorySkills.description: Whenever you make a melee attack while single-weapon fighting, immediately make a second attack for free.

name: Multiweapon_Fighting
description: You are skilled at multiweapon fighting. Your chance to attack with offhand weapons is increased.

categorySkills.name: Multiweapon_Flurry
categorySkills.description: Activated; cooldown 60. You make an attack with every weapon-wielding limb, including extra limbs granted by mutation or technology.

categorySkills.name: Multiweapon_Proficiency
categorySkills.description: Your chance to strike with each of your offhand weapons is increased by 20%.

categorySkills.name: Multiweapon_Expertise
categorySkills.description: Your chance to strike with each of your offhand weapons is increased by 35%.

categorySkills.name: Multiweapon_Mastery
categorySkills.description: Your chance to strike with each of your offhand weapons is increased by 50%.

name: Endurance
description: You are skilled at enduring harsh conditions and situations.

categorySkills.name: Endurance_ShakeItOff
categorySkills.description: Each round you are dazed or stunned, you have a (Toughness-10)% chance to shake off the effect. You also take 25% less damage from poison.

categorySkills.name: Endurance_Swimming
categorySkills.description: Reduces the movement speed penalty when swimming (normally 50 points) by 25 points.

categorySkills.name: Endurance_PoisonTolerance
categorySkills.description: You take 25% less damage from poison.

categorySkills.name: Endurance_Weathered
categorySkills.description: You take 15% less damage from heating and cooling effects. Additionally, the severities of effects that change your temperature are reduced by 15%.

categorySkills.name: Endurance_Juicer
categorySkills.description: You may ingest one additional tonic without it reacting adversely to the tonic you have already ingested.

categorySkills.name: Endurance_Calloused
categorySkills.description: Your natural AV improves to 1.

categorySkills.name: Endurance_Longstrider
categorySkills.description: You may sprint for an additional 10 turns.

name: Physic
description: You are skilled at physicking.

categorySkills.name: Physic_StaunchWounds
categorySkills.description: Bandages you apply are much more effective at stopping bleeding.

categorySkills.name: Physic_Nostrums
categorySkills.description: You can treat bleeding, poison, illness, and disease onset for you and your companions at a campfire.

categorySkills.name: Physic_AmputateLimb
categorySkills.description: You can voluntarily amputate your own limbs and the limbs of infected companions.

categorySkills.name: Physic_Apothecary
categorySkills.description: Healing tonics you apply last an extra round.

name: HeavyWeapons
description: You are skilled with heavy weapons.

categorySkills.name: HeavyWeapons_StrappingShoulders
categorySkills.description: You shoulder your weapons more effectively. Heavy weapons count for half their weight toward your encumbrance.

categorySkills.name: HeavyWeapons_Tank
categorySkills.description: You suffer no movement penalty while wielding a heavy weapon.

categorySkills.name: HeavyWeapons_Sweep
categorySkills.description: You fire 5 shots with your heavy weapon, sweeping over a 90 degree cone. Your heavy weapon is reloaded before each shot.

name: LongBlades
description: You are skilled with long thrusting and slashing blades.

categorySkills.name: LongBladesProficiency
categorySkills.description:
You gain access to two stances.
Aggressive stance: With a long blade in your primary hand, your long blade and short blade attacks gain +1 to your penetration roll but -2 to hit.
Defensive stance: While wielding a long blade in your primary hand, you gain +2 DV.

categorySkills.name: LongBladesLunge
categorySkills.description:
Activated; cooldown 15.
Aggressive stance: Lunge through an empty space at an opponent and attack with +2 to your penetration roll. You must move through the empty space.
Defensive stance: Attack an opponent then lunge backward 2 spaces.
Dueling stance: Attack an opponent with +1 to your penetration roll. The attack is guaranteed to hit and penetrate at least once.

categorySkills.name: LongBladesSwipe
categorySkills.description:
Activated; cooldown 15.
Aggressive stance: Make an attack against all adjacent opponents.
Defensive stance: Push all adjacent creatures back 1 space and attempt to trip opponents (strength/agility save; difficulty 30).
Dueling stance: Attack an opponent and attempt to disarm them (strength save; difficulty 25 + your Agi modifier). The attack is guaranteed to hit and penetrate at least once.

categorySkills.name: LongBladesDuelingStance
categorySkills.description: You gain access to dueling stance. While wielding a long blade in your primary hand, you get +2 to hit with long blades and short blades.

categorySkills.name: LongBladesImprovedAggressiveStance
categorySkills.description: Your penetration bonus in aggressive stance is increased to +2, but your to-hit penalty is increased to -3.

categorySkills.name: LongBladesImprovedDefensiveStance
categorySkills.description: Your DV bonus in defensive stance is increased to +3.

categorySkills.name: LongBladesImprovedDuelistStance
categorySkills.description: Your to-hit bonus in dueling stance is increased to +3.

categorySkills.name: LongBladesDeathblow
categorySkills.description: Activated; cooldown 100. For the next 10 rounds, Lunge and Swipe have no cooldown.

name: Persuasion
description: You are skilled at convincing others.

categorySkills.name: Persuasion_MenacingStare
categorySkills.description: You stare down a nearby opponent and send them fleeing in terror.

categorySkills.name: Persuasion_Intimidate
categorySkills.description: Cooldown 50. You try to terrify adjacent, hostile creatures (1d8 + [Ego modifier] penetration roll vs. MA). On success, a frightened creature flees from you for 6d4 rounds.

categorySkills.name: Persuasion_Berate
categorySkills.description: Cooldown 50. You shame a nearby creature for 6d6 rounds, giving it a -4 penalty to DV, to-hit, Ego, Willpower and a -10% penalty to quickness.

categorySkills.name: Persuasion_SnakeOiler
categorySkills.description: For purposes of bartering, your ego is treated as though it were 4 points higher.

categorySkills.name: Persuasion_Proselytize
categorySkills.description: You persuade an intelligent creature to join you.

categorySkills.name: Persuasion_InspiringPresence
categorySkills.description: Your words embolden your companions.

name: Pistol
description: You are skilled with pistols of various kinds.

categorySkills.name: Pistol_SteadyHands
categorySkills.description: For purposes of determining your accuracy with pistols, your agility is treated as if it were 4 points higher.

categorySkills.name: Pistol_Akimbo
categorySkills.description: Whenever you make a ranged attack while wielding multiple guns, you fire a shot with each of them.

categorySkills.name: Pistol_WeakSpotter
categorySkills.description: You are 5% more likely to score critical hits with pistols (standard chance is 5%).

categorySkills.name: Pistol_SlingAndRun
categorySkills.description: You receive no accuracy penalties for firing pistols while running.

categorySkills.name: Pistol_DisarmingShot
categorySkills.description: You have an agility-based chance to disarm your opponent when you score a hit with a pistol.

categorySkills.name: Pistol_DeadShot
categorySkills.description: Critical hits you score with pistols are more deadly.

categorySkills.name: Pistol_EmptyTheClips
categorySkills.description: Cooldown 200. For 20 rounds, firing a pistol only takes half a round instead of a full round.

categorySkills.name: Pistol_FastestGun
categorySkills.description: The action cost of firing pistols is reduced by 25%.

name: Discipline
description: You are skilled at maintaining self-discipline.

categorySkills.name: Discipline_Meditate
categorySkills.description: While meditating, you regenerate three times as fast, and negative status effects wear out three times as fast. The only action you can take while meditating is Wait. You stop meditating if you take damage in a single round exceeding (Willpower*3)-60. If you rest for 10 or more turns, you automatically begin meditating.

categorySkills.name: Discipline_FastingWay
categorySkills.description:
You hunger and thirst at one-half the normal rate.
Metabolic effects from meals last twice as long.

categorySkills.name: Discipline_IronMind
categorySkills.description: Each round you are confused, you have a (Willpower-10)% chance to shake off the effect.

categorySkills.name: Discipline_Lionheart
categorySkills.description: Each round you are terrified, you have a (Willpower-10)% chance to shake off the effect.

categorySkills.name: Discipline_Conatus
categorySkills.description: You may sprint for an additional 10 turns.

categorySkills.name: Discipline_MindOverBody
categorySkills.description:
You hunger and thirst at one-sixth rate.
Metabolic effects from meals last six times as long.
You suffer no penalty for becoming famished.

name: Shield
description: You are skilled at wielding shields.

categorySkills.name: Shield_Block
categorySkills.description: As long as you wield a shield, there is a 50% chance you block one melee attack per round. When you block an attack, you add the shield's AV bonus to your AV for that attack. If you equip multiple shields, the one block per round limit is per shield, and you only can attempt to block a given attack once, using your best usable shield.

categorySkills.name: Shield_Slam
categorySkills.description: Activated; cooldown 40. You attempt to knock an opponent down and deal (Str modifier)d2 + your shield's AV bonus in damage. Your opponent gets a chance to resist (strength save; difficulty 20 + your Str modifier). Whenever you charge an opponent with a shield equipped, you get a free Shield Slam attack against them.

categorySkills.name: Shield_DeftBlocking
categorySkills.description: Your chance to block with a shield improves to 75%.

categorySkills.name: Shield_SwiftBlocking
categorySkills.description: You may block an additional attack per round per shield.

categorySkills.name: Shield_StaggeringBlock
categorySkills.description: Whenever you block an opponent's attack, there is a (Strength*2)-35% chance that your opponent is stunned for 1d2 rounds.

categorySkills.name: Shield_ShieldWall
categorySkills.description: For the next three rounds, you automatically block all incoming melee attacks (may not be used with bucklers).

name: ShortBlades
description: You are skilled with small one-handed knives and blades.

categorySkills.name: ShortBlades_Expertise
categorySkills.description: You get +1 to hit with short blades. Also, the action costs of attacking with a short blade in your primary hand is reduced by 25%.

categorySkills.name: ShortBlades_Bloodletter
categorySkills.description: Your short blade attacks that penetrate have a 75% chance to cause your opponent to bleed (0-1 damage per turn. toughness save; difficulty 20 + your Agi modifier). The opponent saves to stop bleeding each round, and the save difficulty decreases by 1 each round. This effect can stack a number of times equal to 1 plus your Agi modifier.

categorySkills.name: ShortBlades_Jab
categorySkills.description: Whenever you make an offhand attack with a short blade, you immediately make another attack with that same weapon. Flurry attacks do not trigger this.

categorySkills.name: ShortBlades_Hobble
categorySkills.description: You make an attack with a short blade in your primary hand, looking for a weak spot in your opponent's armor. If you hit, you penetrate exactly once and hobble them (-50% movespeed for 16-20 rounds).

categorySkills.name: ShortBlades_PointedCircle
categorySkills.description: Whenever you juke an opponent while wielding a short blade in your primary hand, you make a free attack. If you have Bloodletter, the attack's chance to cause bleeding is 100%.

categorySkills.name: ShortBlades_Rejoinder
categorySkills.description: Once per turn, when an opponent misses you with a melee attack, there's a 40% chance you make a free attack with a short blade you're wielding.

categorySkills.name: ShortBlades_Shank
categorySkills.description: Activated; cooldown 10 (primary) or 20 (offhand). You make a melee attack with a short blade in your primary hand (preferred) or offhand. If you hit, the attack gets +2 to penetration rolls for each negative status effect your opponent suffers from.

name: Tactics
description: You are aware of basic combat tactics.

categorySkills.name: Tactics_Hurdle
categorySkills.description: You receive no penalty to your DV while sprinting and can jump without interrupting your sprint.

categorySkills.name: Tactics_Throwing
categorySkills.description: Your throw range is increased by 3 and your throw variance is halved when throwing at a target inside your throw range.

categorySkills.name: Tactics_Charge
categorySkills.description: You charge forward two or three squares and perform a melee attack with +1 to your penetration roll.

categorySkills.name: Tactics_Kickback
categorySkills.description: Whenever you fire a missile weapon at a target in melee range, you attempt to kick the target backwards.

categorySkills.name: Tactics_Juke
categorySkills.description: Activated; cooldown 40. You move one square at no action cost. You may swap squares with a hostile opponent.

name: Tinkering
description: You are skilled at examining, building, repairing and modding artifacts.

categorySkills.name: Tinkering_GadgetInspector
categorySkills.description: You are much more successful at examining artifacts, and you can deploy wiring.

categorySkills.name: Tinkering_Disassemble
categorySkills.description: You can disassemble scrap and artifacts for bits. You get the most significant bit from the item schematic plus a 50% chance to receive each remaining bit.

categorySkills.name: Tinkering_ReverseEngineer
categorySkills.description: Whenever you disassemble an item, you have a 25% chance to learn how to build the item. If the item was modded, you also have a 15% chance per mod to learn the mod.

categorySkills.name: Tinkering_Scavenger
categorySkills.description: Whenever you step over garbage, you astutely rifle through it and occasionally discover scrap. Additionally, you harvest extra scrap from robots you destroy.

categorySkills.name: Tinkering_Repair
categorySkills.description: You may repair broken items with Bits.

categorySkills.name: Tinkering_DeployTurret
categorySkills.description: You may deploy missile weapons as static turrets.

categorySkills.name: Tinkering_LayMine
categorySkills.description: You may lay down grenades as mines or set them as bombs.

categorySkills.name: Tinkering_Tinker1
categorySkills.description: You may build items from low-tier schematics and you get 1 free schematic. You can also recharge energy cells and capacitors.

categorySkills.name: Tinkering_Tinker2
categorySkills.description: You may build items from medium-tier schematics and you get 1 free schematic.

categorySkills.name: Tinkering_Tinker3
categorySkills.description: You may build items from high-tier schematics and you get 1 free schematic.

name: Survival
description: You are skilled at wilderness survival.

categorySkills.name: Survival_Camp
categorySkills.description: Start a campfire for cooking meals and preserving foods.

categorySkills.name: Survival_Trailblazer
categorySkills.description:
Doubles the chance of regaining your bearings when you are lost.
Reduces chance of getting lost by about 15%.
You travel on the world map twice as quickly.

categorySkills.name: Survival_PlainsSurvival
categorySkills.description:
Doubles the chance of interesting encounters while traveling through the flower fields on the world map.
Reduces the chance of getting lost in the flower fields from base 12% to 1%.
On the world map, you travel through the flower fields twice as quickly.

categorySkills.name: Survival_SaltmarshSurvival
categorySkills.description:
Doubles the chance of interesting encounters while traveling through the salt marshes and watervine fields on the world map.
Reduces the chance of getting lost in the salt marshes and watervine fields from base 12% to 1%.
On the world map, you travel through the salt marshes and watervine fields twice as quickly.

categorySkills.name: Survival_MountainsSurvival
categorySkills.description:
Doubles the chance of interesting encounters while traveling through the hills and mountains on the world map.
Reduces the chance of getting lost in the hills and mountains from base 12% to 1%.
On the world map, you travel through the hills and mountains twice as quickly.

categorySkills.name: Survival_DesertCanyonSurvival
categorySkills.description:
Doubles the chance of interesting encounters while traveling through the desert canyons on the world map.
Reduces the chance of getting lost in the desert canyons from base 12% to 1%.
On the world map, you travel through the desert canyons twice as quickly.

categorySkills.name: Survival_SaltDesertSurvival
categorySkills.description:
Doubles the chance of interesting encounters while traveling through the salt dunes on the world map.
Reduces the chance of getting lost in the salt dunes from base 10% to 1%.
On the world map, you travel through the salt dunes twice as quickly.

categorySkills.name: Survival_JungleSurvival
categorySkills.description:
Doubles the chance of interesting encounters while traveling through the jungles on the world map.
Reduces the chance of getting lost in the jungles from base 12% to 1%.
On the world map, you travel through the jungles twice as quickly.

categorySkills.name: Survival_RiversLakesSurvival
categorySkills.description:
Doubles the chance of interesting encounters while traveling across rivers and lakes on the world map.
Reduces the chance of getting lost in rivers and lakes from base 12% to 1%.
On the world map, you travel across rivers and lakes twice as quickly.

categorySkills.name: Survival_RuinsSurvival
categorySkills.description:
Doubles the chance of interesting encounters while traveling through chrome ruins on the world map.
Reduces the chance of getting lost in ruins from base 12% to 1%.
On the world map, you travel through ruins twice as quickly.
